City Directory
==============




**Hours of Operation for the City's administrative offices are:**Monday through Friday, 8:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m., excluding public holidays

---

**Directory of Departments**  
(For address info please click **[here](https://www.cityofnewbrunswick.org/how_do_i/contact/index.php)**)  
  
**Administration**  
Michael Drulis, City Administrator  
**Main: 732-745-5007**  
  
**Clerk's Office**

**Main: 732-745-5041**
